titleStmt.title: The Chancellors examination & preparation for a trial As the long imprisonment of George Lord Jefferys late High Chancellor of England, has given him ample leisure for a full and serious consideration of his state, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
A satire on Lord Jeffreys in the form of a last will and testament.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
